data.convo: Could you help me prepare for my presentation on Friday ? I would love to help you prepare for your presentation . I hate to ask you to do something like that . This will not interfere with my work . I promise you that . When could we get together ? I could easily give you some time tomorrow night . Would you like to meet me at the coffee house next door ? Yes , and could you write down anything you might be having trouble with ? I'll come prepared . Goodbye until then . I promise you that you'll do well after we meet .
